verses.text: But \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, together with the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, women of the \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w*, \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, \w Edomites|strong="H0130"\w*, \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, \add and\add* \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*;\f + \fr 11.1 \ft together…: or, beside\f*

Of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add concerning\add* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Ye shall not go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to them, neither shall they come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto you: \add for\add* \w surely|strong="H0403"\w* they will turn \w away|strong="H5186"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w clave|strong="H1692"\w* unto these in \w love|strong="H0157"\w*.

And he had \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w princesses|strong="H8282"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*: and his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5186"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

For it came to pass, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* was \w old|strong="H2209"\w*, \add that\add* his \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5186"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: and his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was not \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as \add was\add* the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

For \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Ashtoreth|strong="H6253"\w* the \w goddess|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Milcom|strong="H4445"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* of the \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft Milcom: also called, Molech\f*

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and went not \w fully|strong="H4390"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as \add did\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.  +  r 11.6  t went…: Heb. fulfilled not after *

Then did \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* for \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w*, the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, in the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and for \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*.

And likewise \w did|strong="H6213"\w* he for all his \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, which burnt \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* and \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, because his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which had \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto him \w twice|strong="H6471"\w*,

And had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him concerning this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, that he should not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: but he \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* not that which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

Wherefore the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, Forasmuch as this is done of thee, and thou hast not \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, which I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee, I will \w surely|strong="H7167"\w* \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* from thee, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it to thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft is done…: Heb. is with thee\f*

Notwithstanding in thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* I will not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it for \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* sake: \add but\add* I will \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* it out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="H7535"\w* I will not rend \w away|strong="H7167"\w* all the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*; \add but\add* will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* to thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* sake, and for \w Jerusalem’s|strong="H3389"\w* sake which I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* stirred \w up|strong="H6965"\w* an \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* the \w Edomite|strong="H0130"\w*: he \add was\add* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*.

For it came to pass, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* was gone \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*, after he had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*;

(For \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* did \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* there with all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, until he had cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*:)

That \w Hadad|strong="H0111"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, he and \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* \w Edomites|strong="H0130"\w* of his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* with him, to \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \add being\add* yet a \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.

And they \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* out of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*: and they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with them out of \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; which \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w appointed|strong="H0559"\w* him \w victuals|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, so that he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of his own \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w* the \w queen|strong="H1377"\w*.

And the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Genubath|strong="H1592"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom \w Tahpenes|strong="H8472"\w* \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and \w Genubath|strong="H1592"\w* was in \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*.

And when \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and that \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, Let me \w depart|strong="H7971"\w*, that I may \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to mine own \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 11.21 \ft Let…: Heb. Send me away\f*

Then \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, But what hast thou \w lacked|strong="H2638"\w* with me, that, behold, thou \w seekest|strong="H1245"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to thine own \w country|strong="H0776"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Nothing: howbeit let me \w go|strong="H7971"\w* in any \w wise|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 11.22 \ft Nothing: Heb. Not\f*

¶ And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* stirred him \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \add another\add* \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w*, \w Rezon|strong="H7331"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliadah|strong="H0450"\w*, which \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* from his \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*:

And he \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* unto him, and became \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* over a \w band|strong="H1416"\w*, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them \add of Zobah:\add* and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*.

And he was an \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, beside the \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* that \w Hadad|strong="H1908"\w* \add did:\add* and he \w abhorred|strong="H6973"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*.

¶ And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, an \w Ephrathite|strong="H0673"\w* of \w Zereda|strong="H6868"\w*, \w Solomon’s|strong="H8010"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, whose \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Zeruah|strong="H6871"\w*, a \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, even he lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And this \add was\add* the \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* that he lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \add his\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Millo|strong="H4407"\w*, \add and\add* \w repaired|strong="H5462"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H6556"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 11.27 \ft repaired: Heb. closed\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \add was\add* a mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*: and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* that he was \w industrious|strong="H6213"\w*, he made him \w ruler|strong="H6485"\w* over all the \w charge|strong="H5447"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.\f + \fr 11.28 \ft was industrious: Heb. did work\f*\f + \fr 11.28 \ft charge: Heb. burden\f*

And it came to pass at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* when \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* the \w Shilonite|strong="H7888"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* him in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; and he had \w clad|strong="H3680"\w* himself with a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w garment|strong="H8008"\w*; and they \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add were\add* alone in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*:

And \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w* \w caught|strong="H8610"\w* the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w garment|strong="H8008"\w* that \add was\add* on him, and \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* it \add in\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7168"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7168"\w*: for thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Behold, I will \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* to thee:

(But he shall have \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* for my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* sake, and for \w Jerusalem’s|strong="H3389"\w* sake, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:)

Because that they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* \w Ashtoreth|strong="H6253"\w* the \w goddess|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w Milcom|strong="H4445"\w* the \w god|strong="H0430"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and have not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \add to keep\add* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, as \add did\add* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

Howbeit I will not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the whole \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: but I will \w make|strong="H7896"\w* him \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* sake, whom I \w chose|strong="H0977"\w*, because he \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*:

But I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* out of his \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it unto thee, \add even\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

And unto his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* may have a \w light|strong="H5216"\w* \w alway|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* me to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there.\f + \fr 11.36 \ft light: Heb. lamp, or, candle\f*

And I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* according to all that thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w desireth|strong="H0183"\w*, and shalt be \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it shall be, if thou wilt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto all that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, and wilt \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add that is\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* and my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, as \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w*; that I will be with thee, and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee a \w sure|strong="H0539"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, as I \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto thee.
And I will for this \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, but not for \w ever|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* therefore to \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w*. And \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, unto \w Shishak|strong="H7895"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and was in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* until the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, and his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*?\f + \fr 11.41 \ft acts: or, words, or, things\f*

And the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.\f + \fr 11.42 \ft time: Heb. days\f*

And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and \w Rehoboam|strong="H7346"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.\f + \fr 11.43 \ft Rehoboam: Gr. Roboam\f*
